Giroud: "Werner's arrival is an additional motivation and it was inevitable that the club recruit a striker. Chelsea are a great club, which spends money to strengthen the team, and I was expecting someone to come. With Ziyech and Werner, Chelsea will try to be more competitive"

"If you had told me that it was a player of my profile who was coming, I would have been worried. It is not. After, as the teams play in a grouped way against us, it's not bad to have a big, a fulcrum that can make the link."

"But I'm not naive: Werner didn't arrive to sit on the bench. But I'll do everything to see that Lampard finds himself in a complex situation when it comes to making his choice."
